content.rendered:
Business Savings

Business Savings

Our savings accounts offer the flexibility of savings for long or short periods of time. Savings balances may also be linked to our exclusive Business Star Checking account to help offset activity charges. Your Community Banker will be pleased to help you select the best account for you.

  • Money Market
  • Regular
  • Certificates of Deposit

Money Market Savings

  • For any business type.
  • Money market rates with limited check writing.
  • No service charge when balance requirements are met.1
  • Tiered rate schedule – the higher your balance, the higher the rate.
  • Interest is earned on all collected balances.
  • Balances may be linked to Business Star or Preferred account to help offset activity or service charges.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Business Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.

Regular Savings

  • Traditional savings for all business types.
  • No service charge when balance requirements are met.1
  • Interest paid quarterly.
  • Interest is earned on all collected balances.
  • Balances may be linked to Business Star or Preferred account to help offset activity or service charges.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Business Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.

Certificates of Deposit

Put your excess cash to work with our FDIC-insured certificates. Lock in your rate for terms from seven days to five years.

related resources

  • Business Schedule of Fees and Charges
  • Deposit Agreement and Disclosure
  • Preventing Business Losses
  • Patriot Act Policy
